typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		address_id as long,
		address_type as string,
		address1 as string,
		address2 as string,
		address3 as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string,
		zipcode as string,
		phone as string,
		email as string,
		Fax as string,
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Addresses
source(output(
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CityStateCountry
source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as timestamp,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as timestamp,
		created_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp,
		effective_start_date as timestamp,
		effective_end_date as timestamp,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		product_id as long,
		product_name as string,
		product_type as string,
		product_description as string,
		issue_date as date,
		valid_till_date as date,
		account_status as string,
		credit_card_limit as long,
		interest_rate as double,
		tenure as long,
		service_charges as string,
		customer_id as long,
		fd_principal_amount as long,
		loan_collateral_value as long,
		loan_amount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> Products
Exists2 assert(expectTrue(!isNull(address_id), false, 'addressIdNotNull', null, 'Address Id is null'),
	expectTrue(lower(address_type) == 'residence' || lower(address_type) == 'business', false, 'addressTypeValid', null, "Address is not residence or business"),
	expectTrue(address1 != "", false, 'address1NotBlank', null, 'Address1 is blank'),
	expectTrue(address2 != "", false, 'address2NotBlank', null, 'Address2 is blank'),
	expectTrue(address3 != "", false, 'address3NotBlank', null, 'Address3 is blank'),
	expectTrue(isInteger(zipcode), false, 'zipcodeNumeric', null, "Zipcode is not numeric"),
	expectTrue(length(toString(phone)) == 11, false, 'phoneNumberNot11digits', null, toString(phone) + " Invalid Phone number length"),
	expectTrue(regexMatch(email, `^\w+([-+.']\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)*\.\w+([-.]\w+)*$`), false, 'validEmail', null, email + " is an invalid email"),
	expectTrue(length(toString(Fax)) == 11, false, 'FaxNumberNot11digits', null, toString(Fax) + " Invalid Phone number length")) ~> AddressesValidation
AddressesValidation derive(address1 = upper(address1),
		address2 = upper(address2),
		address3 = upper(address3),
		address_type = initCap(address_type),
		phone = substring(phone, 1, 1) + "-" + substring(phone, 2, 3) + "-" + substring(phone, 5, 3) + "-" + substring(phone, 8, 4),
		Fax = substring(Fax, 1, 1) + "-" + substring(Fax, 2, 3) + "-" + substring(Fax, 5, 3) + "-" + substring(Fax, 8, 4)) ~> AddressesTransformation
Addresses derive(address1 = iif(isNull(address1), "N/A", address1),
		address2 = iif(isNull(address2), "N/A", address2),
		address3 = iif(isNull(address3), "N/A", address3)) ~> FillNullAddressWithNA
Customers select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> customerIDs
Customers assert(expectTrue(!isNull(customer_id), false, 'custIDNotNull', null, "Customer Id may not be null"),
	expectTrue(upper(source_id) == "ERP", false, 'sourceIDERP', null, source_id + " is an invalid source id -- must be ERP"),
	expectTrue(first_name != "", false, 'firstNameNotBlank', null, toString(customer_id) + ": First Name must not be blank"),
	expectTrue(last_name != "", false, 'lastNameNotBlank', null, toString(customer_id) + ": Last name is blank"),
	expectTrue(gender == "Male" || gender == "Female", false, 'maleOrFemale', null, gender + ": is not a valid gender"),
	expectTrue(marital_status == "Married" || marital_status == "Single", false, 'maritalStatus', null, marital_status + ": is not a valid marital status"),
	expectTrue(avg_family_size > 0, false, 'avgFamilyNot0', null, toString(avg_family_size) + ": is an invalid family size. Must be numeric and cannot be 0."),
	expectTrue(income_level == "Low" || income_level == "Medium" || income_level == "High", false, 'incomeLevelValid', null, income_level + ": is invalid income level. Must be Low-Medium-High"),
	expectTrue(length(identifier) == 11, false, 'identifierLength11', null, identifier + ": is invalid identifier. Must be 11 characters long.")) ~> ValidatedCustomers
ValidatedCustomers derive(source_id = upper(source_id),
		first_name = upper(first_name),
		middle_name = upper(middle_name),
		last_name = upper(last_name)) ~> DerivedColumn1
Products, customerIDs assert(expectExists(Products@customer_id == customerIDs@customer_id, false, 'customerIDExists', null, toString(Products@customer_id) + ": is not a valid customer id")) ~> Assert1
AddressesTransformation filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
FillNullAddressWithNA, CityStateCountry exists(Addresses@city == CityStateCountry@city,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, customerIDs exists(customerIDs@customer_id == customerIDs@customer_id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists2
AddressesTransformation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Addresses_clean.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AddressesClean
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Customers_clean.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CustomersClean
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	partitionFileNames:['AddressErrors.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Errors
Assert1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Products_clean.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ProductsClean

source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as date,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as date,
		created_date as date,
		updated_date as date,
		effective_start_date as date,
		effective_end_date as date,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
Customers assert(expectTrue(!isNull(customer_id), false, 'custIDNotNull', null, "Customer Id may not be null"),
	expectTrue(upper(source_id) == "ERP", false, 'sourceIDERP', null, source_id + " is an invalid source id -- must be ERP"),
	expectTrue(first_name != "", false, 'firstNameNotBlank', null, toString(customer_id) + ": First Name must not be blank"),
	expectTrue(last_name != "", false, 'lastNameNotBlank', null, toString(customer_id) + ": Last name is blank"),
	expectTrue(gender == "Male" || gender == "Female", false, 'maleOrFemale', null, gender + ": is not a valid gender"),
	expectTrue(marital_status == "Married" || marital_status == "Single", false, 'maritalStatus', null, marital_status + ": is not a valid marital status"),
	expectTrue(avg_family_size > 0, false, 'avgFamilyNot0', null, toString(avg_family_size) + ": is an invalid family size. Must be numeric and cannot be 0."),
	expectTrue(income_level == "Low" || income_level == "Medium" || income_level == "High", false, 'incomeLevelValid', null, income_level + ": is invalid income level. Must be Low-Medium-High"),
	expectTrue(length(identifier) == 11, false, 'identifierLength11', null, identifier + ": is invalid identifier. Must be 11 characters long.")) ~> ValidatedCustomers
ValidatedCustomers derive(source_id = upper(source_id),
		first_name = upper(first_name),
		middle_name = upper(middle_name),
		last_name = upper(last_name)) ~> customersTransformed
customersTransformed filter(isError()) ~> hasErrors
customersTransformed sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomersClean
hasErrors sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['customersErrors.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CustomersErrors

source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as timestamp,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as timestamp,
		created_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp,
		effective_start_date as timestamp,
		effective_end_date as timestamp,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		product_id as integer,
		product_name as string,
		product_type as string,
		product_description as string,
		issue_date as date,
		valid_till_date as date,
		account_status as string,
		credit_card_limit as integer,
		interest_rate as double,
		tenure as integer,
		service_charges as string,
		customer_id as integer,
		fd_principal_amount as integer,
		loan_collateral_value as integer,
		loan_amount as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> Products
Customers select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> customerIDs
Products, customerIDs assert(expectExists(Products@customer_id == customerIDs@customer_id, false, 'customerIDExists', null, toString(Products@customer_id) + ": is not a valid customer id"),
	expectTrue(valid_till_date >= issue_date, false, 'validAfterIssueDate'),
	expectTrue(account_status == "Open" || account_status == "Closed", false, 'accountStatusOpenClosed')) ~> Assert1
Assert1 derive(product_name = initCap(product_name),
		product_type = upper(product_type),
		product_description = upper(product_description),
		issue_date = toDate(toString(issue_date), "MMM-dd-yyyy"),
		valid_till_date = toDate(toString(valid_till_date), "MMM-dd-yyyy")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ProductsClean
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['productsErrors.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> productsErrors

source(output(
		address_id as long,
		address_type as string,
		address1 as string,
		address2 as string,
		address3 as string,
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string,
		zipcode as string,
		phone as string,
		email as string,
		Fax as string,
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Addresses
source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as timestamp,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as timestamp,
		created_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp,
		effective_start_date as timestamp,
		effective_end_date as timestamp,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CityStateCountry
AddressesWna, customerIDs, CityStateCountry assert(expectTrue(!isNull(address_id), false, 'addressIdNotNull', null, 'Address Id is null'),
	expectTrue(lower(address_type) == 'residence' || lower(address_type) == 'business', false, 'addressTypeValid', null, "Address is not residence or business"),
	expectTrue(address1 != "", false, 'address1NotBlank', null, 'Address1 is blank'),
	expectTrue(address2 != "", false, 'address2NotBlank', null, 'Address2 is blank'),
	expectTrue(address3 != "", false, 'address3NotBlank', null, 'Address3 is blank'),
	expectTrue(isInteger(zipcode), false, 'zipcodeNumeric', null, "Zipcode is not numeric"),
	expectTrue(length(toString(phone)) == 11, false, 'phoneNumberNot11digits', null, toString(phone) + " Invalid Phone number length"),
	expectTrue(regexMatch(email, `^\w+([-+.']\w+)*@\w+([-.]\w+)*\.\w+([-.]\w+)*$`), false, 'validEmail', null, email + " is an invalid email"),
	expectTrue(length(toString(Fax)) == 11, false, 'FaxNumberNot11digits', null, toString(Fax) + " Invalid Phone number length"),
	expectExists(Addresses@city == CityStateCountry@city, false, 'cityExists', null, Addresses@city + ": is not a recognized city "),
	expectExists(Addresses@state == CityStateCountry@state, false, 'stateExists', null, Addresses@state + ": is not a recognized state"),
	expectExists(Addresses@country == CityStateCountry@country, false, 'countryExists', null, Addresses@country+ ": is not a recognized country"),
	expectExists(Addresses@customer_id == customerIDs@customer_id, false, 'customerIDExists', null, toString(Addresses@customer_id) + ": is not a recognized customer ")) ~> AddressesValidation
Select1 derive(address1 = upper(address1),
		address2 = upper(address2),
		address3 = upper(address3),
		address_type = initCap(address_type),
		phone = substring(phone, 1, 1) + "-" + substring(phone, 2, 3) + "-" + substring(phone, 5, 3) + "-" + substring(phone, 8, 4),
		Fax = substring(Fax, 1, 1) + "-" + substring(Fax, 2, 3) + "-" + substring(Fax, 5, 3) + "-" + substring(Fax, 8, 4)) ~> AddressesTransformation
Addresses derive(address1 = iif(isNull(address1), "N/A", address1),
		address2 = iif(isNull(address2), "N/A", address2),
		address3 = iif(isNull(address3), "N/A", address3)) ~> AddressesWna
Customers select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> customerIDs
AddressesTransformation filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
AddressesValidation select(mapColumn(
		address_id,
		address_type,
		address1,
		address2,
		address3,
		city = Addresses@city,
		state = Addresses@state,
		country = Addresses@country,
		zipcode,
		phone,
		email,
		Fax,
		customer_id = Addresses@customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Filter1 derive(addressIdNotNull = iif(hasError("addressIdNotNull"), 'Address Id is null', ""),
		addressTypeValid = iif(hasError("addressTypeValid"), address_type + " is not valid address type", ""),
		address1NotBlank = iif(hasError("address1NotBlank"), "Address 1 is blank", ""),
		address2NotBlank = iif(hasError("address2NotBlank"), "Address 2 is blank", ""),
		address3NotBlank = iif(hasError("address3NotBlank"), "Address 3 is blank", ""),
		zipcodeNumeric = iif(hasError("zipcodeNumeric"), "Zipcode is not numeric", ""),
		phoneNumberNot11digits = iif(hasError("phoneNumberNot11digits"), toString(phone) + " Invalid Phone number length", ""),
		validEmail = iif(hasError("validEmail"), email + " is an invalid email", ""),
		FaxNumberNot11digits = iif(hasError("FaxNumberNot11digits"), toString(Fax) + " Invalid Phone number length", ""),
		cityExists = iif(hasError("cityExists"), city + ": is not a recognized city", ""),
		stateExists = iif(hasError("stateExists"), state+ ": is not a recognized state", ""),
		countryExists = iif(hasError("countryExists"), country+ ": is not a recognized country", ""),
		customerIDExists = iif(hasError("customerIDExists"), toString(customer_id) + ": is not a recognized customer ", "")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		address_id,
		addressIdNotNull,
		addressTypeValid,
		address1NotBlank,
		address2NotBlank,
		address3NotBlank,
		zipcodeNumeric,
		phoneNumberNot11digits,
		validEmail,
		FaxNumberNot11digits,
		cityExists,
		stateExists,
		countryExists,
		customerIDexists = customerIDExists
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AddressIDErrors
AddressesTransformation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		city as string,
		state as string,
		country as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AddressesClean
AddressIDErrors sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	partitionFileNames:['AddressErrors.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 0,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> addressesErrors

source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as timestamp,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as timestamp,
		created_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp,
		effective_start_date as timestamp,
		effective_end_date as timestamp,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		sr_id as integer,
		customer_id as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		sr_description as string,
		sr_open_date as date,
		sr_close_date as date,
		sr_type as string,
		channel as string,
		sr_cust_feedback as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> SRS
Customers select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> customerIDs
SRS, customerIDs assert(expectTrue(!isNull(sr_id), false, 'srIDNotNull'),
	expectExists(SRS@customer_id == customerIDs@customer_id, false, 'custIDExists'),
	expectTrue(length(sr_description) > 0 && length(sr_description) <= 100, false, 'descriptionLength'),
	expectTrue(sr_close_date >= sr_open_date, false, 'validCloseDate'),
	expectTrue(length(sr_cust_feedback) > 0 && length(sr_cust_feedback) <= 100, false, 'custFeedbackLength')) ~> Assert1
Assert1 filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
Assert1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SrsClean
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['srsErrors.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> srsErrors

source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as timestamp,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as integer,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as timestamp,
		created_date as timestamp,
		updated_date as timestamp,
		effective_start_date as timestamp,
		effective_end_date as timestamp,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		transaction_id as integer,
		customer_id as integer,
		product_id as integer,
		merchant_name as string,
		transaction_description as string,
		transaction_amount as integer,
		type_deposit_withdrawal as string,
		transaction_date as date,
		channel as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> Transactions
Customers select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> customerIDs
Transactions, customerIDs assert(expectTrue(!isNull(transaction_id), false, 'srIDNotNull'),
	expectExists(Transactions@customer_id == customerIDs@customer_id, false, 'custIDExists'),
	expectTrue(!isNull(transaction_amount), false, 'transactionAmt')) ~> Assert1
Assert1 filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
Assert1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TransactionsClean
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['transactionsErrors.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> transactionsErrors

source(output(
		customer_id as long,
		source_id as string,
		first_name as string,
		middle_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as string,
		gender as string,
		nationality as string,
		marital_status as string,
		occupation as string,
		avg_family_size as string,
		income_level as string,
		date_onboarded as string,
		created_date as string,
		updated_date as string,
		effective_start_date as string,
		effective_end_date as string,
		Identifier_type as string,
		identifier as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(customer_id),
	count = count(customer_id)) ~> Aggregate1
Customers select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Customers select(mapColumn(
		occupation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 aggregate(groupBy(occupation),
	count = count(occupation)) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate1 select(mapColumn(
		customer_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Aggregate2 select(mapColumn(
		occupation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Occupations
Select3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerIDs
